patthana22.2:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:4.2: Nakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:4.3: Naakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:4.4: Naabyākataṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:4.5: Nakusalaṃ nasahetukañca naabyākataṃ nasahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:4.6: Nakusalaṃ nasahetukañca naakusalaṃ nasahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:5.2: Ārammaṇe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana22.2:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:6.2: Naakusalaṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:6.3: Naabyākataṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:6.4: Nakusalaṃ naahetukañca naabyākataṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:6.5: Naakusalaṃ naahetukañca naabyākataṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:6.6: Nakusalaṃ naahetukañca naakusalaṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:7.2: Ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … sahajāte dvādasa … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate dvādasa.
